objects.text:
• Supports Hair, Skin & Nail Health
• Promotes Joint Flexibility
• Enhances Cognitive Function
• Zero Carb Keto-Friendly Formula

product_details.name: Grass-Fed Collagen Peptides & MCT Brain Boost (formerly Keto Collagen)
product_details.description: Get the protein your body needs in a delicious, low-carb supplement formulated to minimize impact on your blood sugar levels. Clinical studies have shown collagen supports hair & nail, skin, joint and gut health. Our grass-fed collagen peptides also include MCTs (medium chain triglycerides) to help support cognition and mental clarity.

banner_details:
The banner features a clean and modern design with a wellness product focus. It is centered around a product image on the right, identified as "product_image", presented against a softly lit white background with abstract organic border patterns in light brown. The top-left section of the banner highlights two prominent headline text layers, "heading_1" and "heading_2", stacked and styled in a bold serif typeface, conveying strength and clarity. Below them is the "subheading" layer in uppercase, followed by a horizontal line element ("decorative") for visual separation. The core benefits of the product are listed in bullet-pointed text under "description". The pricing information, "price", is displayed boldly to catch attention, followed by a dark brown rectangular call-to-action button with white uppercase text ("cta") over "cta_background". The layout balances informative text and clean visual design, ideal for promotional use in health and wellness contexts.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #F5F1ED (Light Cream)
- Primary Text: #6B4226 (Rich Brown)
- Secondary Text: #8B7355 (Taupe)
- Bullet Point Text: #4D3319 (Dark Brown)
- Call-to-Action Button: #6B4226 (Rich Brown)
- CTA Text: #FFFFFF (White)
product_color: The product image showcases a clean, minimalistic design with a neutral and premium color palette ideal for health and wellness branding. The dominant colors are soft beige (#F5F2E9) for the background, providing a calm, natural tone. Bold black (#000000) is used for text and accents, creating strong contrast for legibility and emphasis. The lid is a deep charcoal-black (#1C1C1C), adding weight and sophistication to the packaging. The "Vanilla" label uses white text (#FFFFFF) on a black background, making it pop. Overall, the colors are well-balanced—highlighting key text while blending harmoniously for an elegant, trustworthy look suitable for advertisement banners.
